location: INT. LUKE'S X-WING FIGHTER - COCKPIT - TRAVELING
lines: Got him!
Several fighters have broken off from the main group. Come with me!
(over speaker)Pull in! Luke... pull in!
(over speaker)Watch your back, Luke!
(over headset)Watch your back! Fighter's above you, coming in!
I'm hit, but not bad.
Artoo, see what you can do with it. Hang on back there.
(over headset)Red Six...
(over speaker)Can you see Red Five?
(over speaker)There's a heavy fire zone on this side. Red Five, where are you?
I can't shake him!
I'm on him, Luke!
(over headset)Hold on!
Blast it! Wedge where are you?
Thanks, Wedge.
(over speaker)Good shooting, Wedge!
(over speaker)Red Leader...
This is Gold Leader. We're starting out attack run.
(over speaker)I copy, Gold Leader. Move into position.
Stay in attack formation!
(over speaker)The exhaust post is...
...marked and locked in!
Switch power to front deflector screens.
How many guns do you think, Gold Five.
(over speaker)I'd say about twenty guns. Some on the surface, some on the towers.
(over speaker)Death Star will be in range in five minutes.
Switching to targeting computer.
Computer's locked. Getting a signal.
The guns... they've stopped!
Stabilize your read deflectors. Watch for enemy fighters.
They've coming in! Three marks at two ten.
I'll take them myself! Cover me!
(over speaker)Yes, sir.
(into mike)I can't maneuver!
Stay on target.
We're too close.
Stay on target!
Loosen up!
Gold Five to Red Leader...
(over headset)Lost Tiree, lost Dutch.
I copy, Gold Five.
They came from behind...
We've analyzed their attack, sir, and there is a danger. Should I have your ship standing by?
Evacuate? In out moment of triumph? I think you overestimate their chances!
(over speaker)Rebel base, three minutes and closing.
Red Group, this is Red Leader.
(over speaker)Rendezvous at mark six point one.
(over speaker)This is Red Two. Flying toward you.
(over speaker)Red Three, standing by.
(over headset)Red Leader, this is Base One. Keep half your group out of range for the next run.
(over headset)Copy, Base One. Luke, take Red Two and Three. Hold up here and wait for my signal... to start your run.
This is it!
We should be able to see it by now.
Keep your eyes open for those fighters!
There's too much interference!
Red Five, can you see them from where you are?
No sign of any... wait!
(over headset)Coming in point three five.
I see them.
I'm in range.
Target's coming up!
Just hold them off for a few seconds.
Close up formation.
Almost there!
I can't hold them!
It's away!
(over speaker)It's a hit!
(over speaker)Negative.
Negative! It didn't go in. It just impacted on the surface.
(over headset)Red Leader, we're right above you. Turn to point...
...oh-five; we'll cover for you.
(over headset)Stay there...
...I just lost my starboard engine.
(over headset)Get set to make your attack run.
Rebel base, one minute and closing.
(over speaker)Biggs, Wedge, let's close it up. We're going in. We're going in full throttle.
Right with you, boss.
Luke, at that speed will you be able to pull out in time?
It'll be just like Beggar's Canyon back home.
We'll stay back far enough to cover you.
(over headset)My scope shows the tower, but I can't see the exhaust port! Are you sure the computer can hit it?
Watch yourself! Increase speed full throttle!
What about the tower?
You worry about those fighters! I'll worry about the tower!
(to Artoo)Artoo... that, that stabilizer's broken loose again! See if you can't lock it down!
(over speaker)I'm hit! I can't stay with you.
(over speaker)Get clear, Wedge.
You can't do any more good back there!
Sorry!
Let him go! Stay on the leader!
Hurry, Luke, they're coming in much faster this time. I can't hold them!
Artoo, try and increase the power!
(over headset)Hurry up, Luke!
Wait!
Rebel base, thirty seconds and closing.
I'm on the leader.
Hang on, Artoo!
Use the Force, Luke.
Let go, Luke.
The Force is strong with this one!
Luke, trust me.
(over speaker)His computer's off. Luke, you switched off your targeting computer. What's wrong?
(over speaker)Nothing. I'm all right.
I've lost Artoo!
The Death Star has cleared the planet. The Death Star has cleared the planet.
Rebel base, in range.
You may fire when ready.
Commence primary ignition.
I have you now.
What?
(yelling)Yahoo!
Look out!
(into mike)You're all clear, kid.
(over speaker)Now let's blow this thing and go home!
Stand by to fire at Rebel base.
Standing by.
Great shot, kid. That was one in a million.
Remember, the Force will be with you... always.
Luke! Luke! Luke!
(laughing)Hey! Hey!
(laughing)I knew you'd come back! I just knew it!
Well, I wasn't gonna let you get all the credit and take all the reward.
(laughing)Hey, I knew there was more to you than money.
Oh, no!
Oh, my! Artoo! Can you hear me? Say something!(to mechanic)You can repair him, can't you?
We'll get to work on him right away.
You must repair him! Sir, if any of my circuits or gears will help, I'll gladly donate them.
He'll be all right.
